allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add project analysis and documentation agents

Initial setup of AI agents for project analysis, architecture, and documentation generation including:
- Project brief, PRD, and research documentation
- Architecture patterns and technical specifications  
- Background research materials and references
- User context and project structure documentation

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add BMad framework and workflow system

Complete BMad (Business Method and Development) framework implementation including:
- Core configuration and manifest files
- BMM (Business Method and Modeling) agents, workflows, and documentation
- Test architecture knowledge base and workflows
- Multi-platform agent configurations (Claude, Crush, Gemini, Qwen)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Claude Code agent configurations

Multi-platform Claude Code agent configurations for BMad framework including:
- Analysis agents (API documenter, codebase analyzer, data analyst, pattern detector)
- Planning agents (dependency mapper, epic optimizer, requirements analyst, etc.)
- Research agents (market researcher, tech debt auditor)
- Review agents (document reviewer, technical evaluator, test coverage analyzer)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-platform AI agent configurations

Complete agent configurations for multiple AI platforms:
- Crush: BMad agents and workflows for Crush platform
- Gemini: TOML configurations for all BMad agents and tasks
- Qwen: TOML configurations for BMad agents and workflows

Enables cross-platform compatibility for the BMad framework.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Serena semantic coding system

Serena semantic coding tools and memory system including:
- Project configuration and memory files for codebase context
- Memory storage for project overview, structure, tech stack, and commands
- Semantic analysis tools for intelligent code navigation and understanding

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add project documentation and tooling setup

Project-level documentation and development tools:
- AGENTS.md: Complete agent documentation and usage guide
- CLAUDE.md: Claude Code project instructions and overview
- gitingest-2025-11.txt: Git repository analysis and ingestion data
- mcp-servers/: MCP server configurations for enhanced development
- team-fullstack.txt: Full-stack development team configuration

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update package managers and dependencies

Package management updates for development environments:
- Switch from yarn to pnpm for Studio (Sanity) with updated lock file
- Switch from yarn to npm for web (Next.js) with updated lock file
- Remove root yarn.lock as no longer needed
- Update package.json dependencies across both environments

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
